# üéÆ Game Settings

Gamemodes

Standard
Standard gamemode is normal Among Us with the changes of roles through TOHE-R.

# Ejection

  • Confirm Ejections Mode
    • Set how the game will describe ejections
      • None - Ejections will be described as ‚Äú#### was ejected‚Äù
      • Team - Ejections will tell you what team the player was on
      • Role - Ejections will tell you what role the player was
  • Show remaining Impostors on ejects
    • ON: The game will tell you how many Impostors are left
      • Show remaining Neutral Killers on ejects
        • ON: The game will tell you how many Neutral Killers are left
        • OFF: The game will not tell you how many Neutral Killers are left
      • Show remaining Coven members on ejects
        • ON: The game will tell you how many Coven members are left
        • OFF: The game will not tell you how many Coven members are left
    • OFF: The game will not tell you how many Impostors are left
  • Show what team the ejected player's role is on
    • ON: The game will tell you what team the ejected player's role is on
    • OFF: The game will not tell you what team the ejected player's role is on
  • Confirm Egoists on ejection
    • ON: Egoists will be confirmed on ejection
    • OFF: Egoists will not be confirmed on ejection
  • Confirm Lovers on ejection
    • ON: Lovers will be confirmed on ejection
    • OFF: Lovers will not be confirmed on ejection

# Maps

  • Random Maps Mode
    • ON: Map will be chosen randomly
      • Chance that the map is
        • Skeld - Set the chance that the map will be Skeld
        • Mira HQ - Set the chance that the map will be Mira HQ
        • Polus - Set the chance that the map will be Polus
        • Airship - Set the chance that the map will be Airship
        • Use a more random map selection
          • ON: Maps will be selected even more randomly
          • OFF: Maps will not be selected even more randomly
    • Random Spawns
      • ON: Spawn locations will be chosen randomly
        • Additional Spawn Locations (Airship)
          • ON: More spawn locations will be added
          • OFF: More spawn locations will not be added
      • OFF: Spawn locations will be chosen normally
    • Variable Electrical
      • The Electrical room will be randomized (Airship)
    • Disable Moving Platform (Airship)
      • ON: Moving platform will be disabled
      • OFF: Moving platform will be enabled

# Sabotage

  • Camouflage During Comms Sabotage
    • ON: when Comms are sabotaged, everyone will turn into the specified appearance
    • OFF: Camouflage Comms Sabotage works like it normally would
  • Disable body reporting while camouflaged
    • ON: players cannot report bodies while camouflaged
    • OFF: players can report bodies while camouflaged
  • Sabotage Duration Control
    • ON: the host can control how long sabotages last
      • Polus Reactor Time Limit
        • Set how long the Polus Reactor sabotage will last
      • Airship Reactor Time Limit
        • Set how long the Airship Reactor sabotage will last
    • OFF: the sabotages will last their normal duration
  • Fix Lights Special Settings
    • ON: the host can control which light panels are active (Airship)
      • Disable Viewing Deck Lights Panel (Airship)
        • ON: the Viewing Deck Lights Panel will be disabled
        • OFF: the Viewing Deck Lights Panel will be enabled
      • Disable Gap Room Lights Panel (Airship)
        • ON: the Gap Room Lights Panel will be disabled
        • OFF: the Gap Room Lights Panel will be enabled
      • Disable Cargo Lights Panel
        • ON: the Cargo Lights Panel will be disabled
        • OFF: the Cargo Lights Panel will be enabled

# Disable

  • Disable Unnecessary Shield Animations
    • ON: Unnecessary animations will be disabled
    • OFF: All animations will be enabled
  • Disable Kill Animations on Guesses
    • ON: Kill animations will be disabled when guessing
    • OFF: Kill animations will be enabled when guessing
  • Disable Vanilla Roles
    • ON: the host can disable Vanilla Roles
    • OFF: Vanilla Roles will be enabled
  • Disable Task Win
    • ON: Task wins will not be possible
    • OFF: Task wins will be possible
  • Disable Meetings
    • ON: Meetings will not be possible
    • OFF: Meetings will be possible
  • Disable Sabotages
    • ON: Sabotages will not be possible
      • Disable Doors Sabotage
        • ON: Doors Sabotage will be disabled
        • OFF: Doors Sabotage will be enabled
    • OFF: Sabotages will be possible
  • Disable Devices
    • ON: Devices will be disabled
      • Disable Skeld Devices
        • ON: Skeld Devices will be disabled
          • Disable Admin
            • ON: Admin will be disabled
            • OFF: Admin will be enabled
          • Disable Cameras
            • ON: Cameras will be disabled
            • OFF: Cameras will be enabled
        • OFF: Skeld Devices will be enabled
      • Disable MiraHQ Devices
        • ON: MiraHQ Devices will be disabled
          • Disable Admin
            • ON: Admin will be disabled
            • OFF: Admin will be enabled
          • Disable DoorLog
            • ON: DoorLog will be disabled
            • OFF: DoorLog will be enabled
        • OFF: MiraHQ Devices will be enabled
      • Disable Polus Devices
        • ON: Polus Devices will be disabled
          • Disable Admin
            • ON: Admin will be disabled
            • OFF: Admin will be enabled
          • Disable Cameras
            • ON: Cameras will be disabled
            • OFF: Cameras will be enabled
          • Disable Vitals
            • ON: Vitals will be disabled
            • OFF: Vitals will be enabled
        • OFF: Polus Devices will be enabled
      • Disable Airship Devices
        • ON: Airship Devices will be disabled
          • Disable Cockpit Admin
            • ON: Cockpit Admin will be disabled
            • OFF: Cockpit Admin will be enabled
          • Disable Records Admin
            • ON: Records Admin will be disabled
            • OFF: Records Admin will be enabled
          • Disable Cameras
            • ON: Cameras will be disabled
            • OFF: Cameras will be enabled
          • Disable Vitals
            • ON: Vitals will be disabled
            • OFF: Vitals will be enabled
        • OFF: Airship Devices will be enabled
    • Ignore Conditions
      • Ignore Impostors
        • ON: Impostors conditions will be ignored
        • OFF: Impostors conditions will not be ignored
      • Ignore Neutrals
        • ON: Neutrals conditions will be ignored
        • OFF: Neutrals conditions will not be ignored
      • Ignore Crewmates
        • ON: Crewmates conditions will be ignored
        • OFF: Crewmates conditions will not be ignored
      • Ignore after First Death
        • ON: Conditions will be ignored after the first death
        • OFF: Conditions will not be ignored after the first death

# Meeting

  • Sync Buttons Mode
    • ON: the host can control how many buttons are allowed overall
    • OFF: the buttons needed to call a meeting will be normal
  • Meeting When No One is Dead
    • ON: the host can control whether meetings can be called when no one is dead
      • Meeting Time When No One is Dead
        • Set how long the meeting will last when no one is dead
    • OFF: meetings can be called when no one is dead
  • Additional Emergency Cooldown
    • Minimum Living Players to be Applied
      • Set how many players need to be alive for the additional emergency cooldown to be applied
    • Additional Cooldown
      • Set how long the additional emergency cooldown will be
  • Voting Mode
    • ON: Change how votes work
      • If the Player Skipped
        • No vote - The player's vote will not be counted
        • Suicide - The player will suicide after meeting
          • Ignore the First Meeting
            • ON: The first meeting will not suicide the player
            • OFF: The first meeting will suicide the player
          • Ignore when No Dead Body
            • ON: If there's no dead body, skipping will not suicide the player
            • OFF: If there's no dead body, skipping will suicide the player
          • Ignore at Emergency Meetings
            • ON: If an Emergency Button is called, skipping will not suicide the player
            • OFF: If an Emergency Button is called, skipping will suicide the player
        • Self Vote - The player will vote themself
          • Ignore the First Meeting
            • ON: The first meeting will not suicide the player
            • OFF: The first meeting will suicide the player
          • Ignore when No Dead Body
            • ON: If there's no dead body, skipping will not suicide the player
            • OFF: If there's no dead body, skipping will suicide the player
          • Ignore at Emergency Meetings
            • ON: If an Emergency Button is called, skipping will not suicide the player
            • OFF: If an Emergency Button is called, skipping will suicide the player
      • If the player didn't vote
        • No vote - No vote will be tallied (Abstain)
        • Suicide - The player will suicide after the meeting
        • Self Vote - The player will vote themself
        • Skip - The player will automatically skip
      • When Tied Vote
        • No ejects - No ejects will happen (Tied)
        • Eject All - Ejects all tied players
        • Eject Random - Ejects a random player between the tied players
    • OFF: Votes will remain the same

# Different

  • Fall From Ladders
    • ON: Players will fall from ladders
      • Fall to Death Chance
        • Set the chance that players have to die when falling from ladders
    • OFF: Players will not fall from ladders
  • Reset First Kill Cooldown
    • ON: The kill cooldown will be reset to their respective cooldowns
    • OFF: The kill cooldown will be standard
  • Shield the person who got killed first in the last game
    • ON: Protects the player who was killed in the previous game
    • OFF: The game will go as normal
  • Kill Flash Duration
    • Set how long the kill flash will last

# Ghost

  • Ghosts Exempt From Tasks
    • ON: Ghosts will be exempt from tasks
    • OFF: Ghosts will not be exempt from tasks
  • Ghosts Can See Other Roles
    • ON: Ghosts will be able to see other players' roles
    • OFF: Ghosts will not be able to see other players' roles
  • Ghosts Can See Vote Colors
    • ON: Ghosts will be able to see other players' vote colors
    • OFF: Ghosts will not be able to see other players' vote colors
  • Ghosts Can See Cause of Death
    • ON: Ghosts will be able to see the cause of death of other players
    • OFF: Ghosts will not be able to see the cause of death of other players

Solo PVP
Solo PVP is a gamemode designed to have a Player VS Player game. Settings are drastically different and only one player will win in the end.
  • Game Master
    • ON: the host can control the game
    • OFF: the host cannot control the game
  • Game duration
    • Set how long the game will last
  • Attack Cooldown
    • Set how long the cooldown is between attacks
  • Default HP
    • Set how much HP each player has
  • Default Attack
    • Set how much damage each player does
  • Recover Per Second
    • Set how much HP each player recovers per second
  • Recover Cooldown
    • Set how long the cooldown is between each recovery
  • Resurrection waiting time
    • Set how long a player has to wait to respawn after dying
  • Kill bonus multiplier
    • Set how much bonus HP a player gets after killing another player
  • Boot players who get stuck in the vent (may trigger official anti cheating)
    • ON: Players who get stuck in the vent will be kicked from the lobby
    • OFF: Players who get stuck in the vent will not be kicked from the lobby
